s.text: Sam Donaldson weasels, saying that his prediction of a departing Clinton was contingent upon the allegations being proved true.
Punditus Interruptus II, The Sequel: One moment McLaughlin Group "host" John McLaughlin is asking Pat Buchanan to "stop baiting" Eleanor Clift.
Punditus Interruptus II, The Sequel: One moment McLaughlin Group "host" John McLaughlin is asking Pat Buchanan to "stop baiting" Eleanor Clift.
Earlier, Novak actually ask ed Carlson if he could interrupt!
This Week With Sam and Cokie (ABC) co-host Cokie Roberts asks her colleagues what went wrong with their predictions from last week.
Hunt asks Novak sweetly at one point if Margaret Carlson can speak.
